name: Pru the Pigeon
description:
Dive into a bite-sized adventure with Pru the Pigeon, a delightful 3D platformer collect-a-thon that lovingly nods to gaming classics.

Embark on a journey through Asasco, the realm of pigeons and hot dogs. Collect everything in sight, and aid the locals to rescue their cherished land.





Key Features:

- Charming environments and characters
- 15 main courses
- A fully explorable hub world
- An expansive and expressive moveset
- Bonus levels
